channel.title: Saturday Morning Breakfast Cereal
channel.description: Latest Saturday Morning Breakfast Cereal comics and news

item.title: Saturday Morning Breakfast Cereal - Tundra
item.description:
Click here to go see the bonus panel!

Hovertext:
One day, we will clone the Dodo and reintroduce it to an underwater island.


Today's News:

Hey geeks, if you buy the new book via Barnes and Noble, you can get a free digital comic describe how the project started!
item.author: tech@thehiveworks.com

item.title: Saturday Morning Breakfast Cereal - Critical
item.description:
Click here to go see the bonus panel!

Hovertext:
Sometimes you come up with a full idea, and sometimes you start from a pun and work backward.


Today's News:

Thanks, geeks!
item.author: tech@thehiveworks.com

item.title: Saturday Morning Breakfast Cereal - Jurassic
item.description:
Click here to go see the bonus panel!

Hovertext:
I am prepared to offer my services to the writing of Jurassic Park Part 17.

item.description:

Hovertext:
This joke is exactly as complicated as you think it is.

item.title: Saturday Morning Breakfast Cereal - Love
item.description:
Click here to go see the bonus panel!

Hovertext:
All containers of amphetamines just have 'AMPHETAMINES' written on the side in big letters.


Today's News:

item.title: Saturday Morning Breakfast Cereal - Anti-joke
item.description:
Click here to go see the bonus panel!

Hovertext:
What, you thought the hovertext would save you? No. No deal. Go read Kate Beaton if you like actual jokes.


Today's News:
item.author: tech@thehiveworks.com

item.title: Saturday Morning Breakfast Cereal - Gartok
item.description:
Click here to go see the bonus panel!

Hovertext:
I wonder how many people will think 'isn't evo psych' weird and how many people will think 'aren't humans weird.'


Today's News:
item.author: tech@thehiveworks.com

item.title: Saturday Morning Breakfast Cereal - Emotion
item.description:
Click here to go see the bonus panel!

Hovertext:
'Yeah, aliens are slowly devouring my face, but that's just life, bro. Pass me another beer wouldja?'


Today's News:
item.author: tech@thehiveworks.com

item.title: Saturday Morning Breakfast Cereal - Ass
item.description:
Click here to go see the bonus panel!

Hovertext:
Based on the success of the joke about Welsh orthography, I anticipate massive success for this ass business.


Today's News:

item.title: Saturday Morning Breakfast Cereal - Prosperity
item.description:
Click here to go see the bonus panel!

Hovertext:
He has perfect vision. He just wears the bifocals so he can take them off dramatically.


Today's News:
item.author: tech@thehiveworks.com

item.title: Saturday Morning Breakfast Cereal - Opinions
item.description:
Click here to go see the bonus panel!

Hovertext:
I actually once met a guy who told me he got into physics explicitly to be able to make proclamations like Einstein. He later switched to a business major. Hopefully he's proclaiming as well as possible still.


Today's News:
item.author: tech@thehiveworks.com

item.title: Saturday Morning Breakfast Cereal - Life Tip
item.description:
Click here to go see the bonus panel!

Hovertext:
If you imagine social media as a conscious individual, it's like having a friend you want to cut out of your life, but whose gossip is too good to let go.


Today's News:
item.author: tech@thehiveworks.com

item.title: Saturday Morning Breakfast Cereal - Welsh
item.description:
Click here to go see the bonus panel!

Hovertext:
Found this delightful story in 'The Monsters and the Critics: And Other Essays.'


Today's News:

item.title: Saturday Morning Breakfast Cereal - Humility
item.description:
Click here to go see the bonus panel!

Hovertext:
I'm just realizing most of my Life Tips involve emotionally damaging other people.


Today's News:
item.author: tech@thehiveworks.com

item.title: Saturday Morning Breakfast Cereal - GAN
item.description:
Click here to go see the bonus panel!

Hovertext:
The other day I was really freaked out that a computer could generate faces of people who DON'T REALLY EXIST, only to later realize painters have been doing this for several millenia.


Today's News:

item.title: Saturday Morning Breakfast Cereal - Test
item.description:
Click here to go see the bonus panel!

Hovertext:
When cheating on tests, you really only want to look at work by humans, chimps, or parrots.

Hovertext:
I think we could implement this in all sports, with the one downside that they'd be unwatchable.

item.description:
